channel.title: Pk-Isle Source
channel.description:
[size=30pt]Pk-Isle Source[/size] [move][u]CREATED NEW OWNER ZONE (::MZONE)[/u][/move]
[size=15pt][u]Downloads[/u][/size] Server Download Link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=75Y5N9QN Client Download Link (silabsoft): http://www.megaupload.com/?d=A16TCGGV [u]OR PLAY ON: www.client.silabsoft.org/client.php[/u]
[u]Info[/u] This server is based on SILABSOFT. I might change to 317 later. Hope you'll enjoy. I'm not the best coder... But it's a good start :)
[u]Bugs[/u] (Bugs? Contact me: milocorneille@hotmail.com)
[u]Credits[/u] 85% Credits to me 15% Credits to original source
